articles.title: Costco rotisserie chicken slammed in surprise new ranking — but one beloved NYC store has a lot to cluck about
articles.author: Fabiana Buontempo
articles.summary: Costco is now allowing customers to 'buy now, pay later' with Affirm for purchases ranging from $500 to $17,500. This new payment option is being introduced as summer approaches, targeting purchases like outdoor entertaining essentials and appliances.

articles.title: LF launches global online site for HAZZYS to expand international reach
articles.author: Kim Eun-Young
articles.summary: LF launched a global online site for HAZZYS, providing multilingual services in English and Chinese. The site features customized features for global customers and direct shipping to countries like the United States, Hong Kong, the Philippines, and Singapore. HAZZYS plans to expand shipping to more countries.

articles.title: REI Is Selling Thule's 'Reliable' Roof Box for a Rare $130 Off, and Shoppers Say It's 'Excellent' for Road Trips
articles.author: Cameron Le Blanc
articles.summary: Men's Journal may earn a commission if you buy the Thule Pulse L Roof Box through their links. The Thule Pulse L Roof Box is featured.

articles.title: M778, others champion innovation at World Product Day
articles.author: Justice Okamgba
articles.summary: M778 and Innovate Africa Fund are partnering to launch World Product Day Lagos, a one-day conference on May 25, 2025. The conference aims to foster a culture of product excellence and user-centric innovation, offering workshops, hackathons, a job fair, and fireside chats for product professionals and startup founders to build stronger products for Africa.

articles.title: We must take a nuclear leap into the unknown
articles.author: Paul Mason
articles.summary: Helsing, a German company, is set to launch the SG1-Fathom, a miniature submarine utilizing passive sonar and AI to detect enemy ships. The AI system, named Lura, is trained on acoustic recordings and learns from new inputs, surfacing to ping location data via satellite. The product is designed to be affordable and deployed in large numbers to potentially neutralize the stealth advantage of nuclear-powered submarines.

articles.title: Xreal Unveils Project Aura, New AI-Powered Android XR Glasses, at Google I/O
articles.author: CNET
articles.summary: Google is launching new glasses as the second confirmed project within its AI-powered Android XR family of products. This announcement signifies the expansion of Google's product line in the XR domain.

articles.title: Google's AI virtual try-on lets you 'wear' clothes before purchasing
articles.author: Abhinav Kaustubh
articles.summary: Google has launched new AI-powered shopping features, including a virtual try-on feature available in Search Labs across the US. Furthermore, Google is enhancing its Gemini-powered AI Mode to create a more conversational shopping experience and will offer advanced price tracking capabilities, along with a new 'agentic' checkout feature using Google Pay.

articles.title: The Pizza Cupcake enters a new era
articles.author: Food Business News
articles.summary: Startup Incredifulls rebrands and introduces breakfast cups to its product line. This expansion represents a new offering within their portfolio.

articles.title: Building's up, mascot has arrived at Layne's Chicken Fingers' NLR McCain location
articles.author: Rhett Brinkley
articles.summary: Layne's Chicken Fingers is opening a new location in North Little Rock, Arkansas. This will be the second location for franchisee Jake Willett in Arkansas, with the first being in Benton.

articles.title: Nutella Is Releasing a New Flavor for the First Time in Six Decades
articles.author: Ca Lea Johnson
articles.summary: Ferrero is launching Nutella Peanut, a new spread combining cocoa hazelnut and roasted peanuts, expected to be available in spring 2026 after being showcased at the Sweets & Snacks Expo 2025. Additionally, Ferrero will release square versions of Ferrero Rocher chocolates in September 2025, offered in dark hazelnut, caramel hazelnut, and milk hazelnut flavors.

articles.title: The 6 best instant stain removers, tested and reviewed: Ranked
articles.author: Annie Shigo
articles.summary: The article reviews and compares various instant stain removers available on the market, including wipes (like Miss Mouth's), pens, sprays, and gels.  It evaluates their effectiveness on different types of stains (coffee, oil, lipstick etc.) and considers factors such as ease of use, quickness, and control during application. The review highlights the pros and cons of each type, providing information to consumers to choose the right product depending on the type of stain.

articles.title: Google fixes worst thing about online clothes shopping with 30-second phone trick – and it works on BILLIONS of products
articles.author: Jamie Harris
articles.summary: Google has introduced a new "try it on" tool, powered by an AI image generation model, that allows users to virtually try on clothes by uploading a full-length body image. Additionally, Google is launching a feature that provides price alerts for products, enabling users to set desired prices and receive notifications when items reach that value, facilitating direct purchases through Google.

articles.title: Google fixes worst thing about online clothes shopping with 30-second phone trick – and it works on BILLIONS of products
articles.author: Jamie Harris
articles.summary: Google has launched a "try it on" tool that allows users to virtually try on clothes by uploading a full-length body image. As part of Google's new AI Mode tool, users can also set price alerts for products and purchase them directly through Google Search.

articles.title: You can now 'try on' clothes in Google search
articles.summary: Google has launched an AI-driven virtual fitting room feature in Search Labs, enabling users to visualize clothing on themselves by uploading a photo. Additionally, Google introduced an 'AI Mode' to provide personalized product recommendations and is planning to launch an 'agentic' checkout feature to streamline online purchases.

articles.title: Samsung just leveled up this key gaming feature on their TVs
articles.author: Craig Donaldson
articles.summary: Samsung has launched its 2025 OLED TV lineup which now supports Nvidia G-SYNC, enhancing the gaming experience by reducing screen tearing. The G-SYNC feature will first be available on the flagship S95F OLED TV and then roll out to other models in the 2025 lineup, which includes the S90F and S85F series.  The new TVs also support AMD FreeSync Premium Pro and include gaming features like Auto Low Latency Mode and Samsung Gaming Hub.

articles.title: Google upgrades AI tools for shopping
articles.author: Kelly Tyko
articles.summary: Google has launched an updated AI-powered "try it on" feature for its shopping tools. This new feature, which is an experiment in Google Search Labs, enables consumers to upload a photo of themselves and virtually try on clothes from brands like Levi's, Abercrombie, Staud, Pistola Denim and Quince.

articles.title: How to watch the Google IO 2025 keynote
articles.author: John McCann
articles.summary: Google is expected to announce new products and services at Google IO 2025. Anticipated announcements include updates to Android 16, enhancements to Gemini AI, and possible introductions of new VR/AR headsets and its Android XR platform.

articles.title: ChatGPT is coming for your shopping cart
articles.author: Lauren Sams
articles.summary: OpenAI launched Shopping GPT, a new product designed to offer a conversational shopping experience similar to Google Shopping. Shopping GPT presents image tiles, descriptions, and pulls in review content, as stated by OpenAI's Matt Weaver.

articles.title: Google's using AI to allow you to try clothes on before you buy
articles.author: Mark Hachman
articles.summary: Google is launching an AI-powered feature that allows users to virtually try on clothes. Users upload a full-body photo, and Google's AI analyzes the clothing and displays how it looks on the user.

articles.title: Flam: $14 Million Secured For Scaling AI Infrastructure
articles.author: Amit Chowdhry
articles.summary: Flam is launching a new AI infrastructure and platform that enables brands to create and publish interactive MR, 3D & Digital experiences.  The platform is used by brands like Google and Samsung to create interactive content via QR codes or links, showcasing products and stories. Future product development includes GenAI-driven 3D asset generation.

articles.title: New Gen: $4.5 Million Seed Secured For AI-Based Commerce Platform
articles.author: Amit Chowdhry
articles.summary: New Generation (New Gen) has launched an AI-based shopping platform with $4.5 million in seed funding. The platform transforms traditional product catalogs into AI-readable data and provides a generative interface to allow brands to create custom AI-native storefronts that respond to both human users and AI agents. This gives visual answers through natural language interaction and creates a dedicated entry point optimized for human shoppers and AI-driven traffic.

articles.title: Exclusive: Google Sees Smart Glasses as the 'Next Frontier' for AI. And It's Not Working Alone
articles.author: Scott Stein
articles.summary: Google is developing a new Android XR system and AI-powered smart glasses using Gemini AI, aiming to integrate AI directly into wearable technology. This includes a mixed-reality headset developed in collaboration with Samsung and future glasses possibly from Warby Parker, marking a renewed focus on XR devices.

articles.title: Ninja's New Ice Cream Machine Makes Swirling Soft Serve, and We Tried It
articles.author: Corin Cesaric
articles.summary: Ninja and Creami launched the Ninja Swirl by Creami, a countertop gadget for making homemade ice cream. The product features six soft-serve settings, a clean design, and dishwasher-safe removable parts and it is great for prepping desserts, healthy alternatives and protein shakes.

articles.title: Comcast Advertising Introduces New AI Platform To Help Small and Local Businesses Create Cost Effective Commercials In Minutes
articles.author: Mark K. Miller
articles.summary: Comcast Advertising launched a new AI creative platform in partnership with Waymark, enabling brands to easily create TV-grade ads. The platform scans a brand's website to generate commercials that can be adjusted for messaging, graphics, and language. This new service aims to reduce the time and cost associated with traditional TV commercial production, making TV advertising more accessible.

articles.title: Google's Android XR Glasses Are the Smart Assistant You'll Actually Want to Wear
articles.author: Alexander Maxham
articles.summary: Google previewed its upcoming Android XR glasses, powered by the Gemini AI platform, at Google I/O. These smart glasses feature a camera, microphones, speakers, and an optional in-lens display, offering hands-free assistance such as turn-by-turn directions and live language translations. Google is collaborating with eyewear brands like Gentle Monster and Warby Parker, and expanding its partnership with Samsung, with the platform set to open to developers in 2025.

articles.title: Woolchemy: New Zealand company wins global award for eco-friendly hygiene breakthrough
articles.author: The Country
articles.summary: Woolchemy is launching neweFlex, a material used in hygiene products like nappies and feminine hygiene products. neweFlex utilizes neweFibre as its core and aims to replace petroleum-based plastics with a renewable, biodegradable alternative. The product is patent-granted in two jurisdictions and pending in 14 more.

articles.title: This is what Google will look like when AI is everywhere
articles.author: hlangley@businessinsider.com
articles.summary: Google is rolling out its AI Mode to users in the US, offering a conversational search experience. The company is also working on "new tricks" in Labs, including Deep Search, which provides fully cited reports. Google is launching Veo 3, a video generation model with sound effects support, and making Gemini Live available to everyone with the Gemini App.

articles.title: Google outlines its big plans for the future of search
articles.author: Lisa Eadicicco
articles.summary: Google is introducing AI Mode, broadening its availability to all US users through the Google app, which breaks down queries into subtopics for more specific answers. Project Mariner, a research prototype, will be available for tasks like booking tickets and making reservations through services like Ticketmaster and Resy. A new visual search feature is being added to the Google app, enabling users to ask questions about their surroundings in real time.

articles.title: Google outlines its big plans for the future of search
articles.author: Lisa Eadicicco
articles.summary: Google is introducing AI Mode to its search engine, which breaks down queries into subtopics for more specific answers, and will personalize results based on search history. Additionally, Google is launching Project Mariner, a prototype technology that automates tasks like booking tickets and reservations. The Google app is also getting a new visual search feature that allows users to ask questions about their surroundings using their phone's camera.

articles.title: Google adds virtual 'try-on' option to search, agentic AI for purchases
articles.author: Daniel Howley
articles.summary: Google is introducing shopping capabilities to its AI Mode, allowing users to shop for items and virtually try on clothes. The new features include virtual try-on, price tracking, and agentic AI-based checkout. The agentic checkout will be available in the US in the coming months.

articles.title: Google launches AI ‘agents' to pick and pay for your everyday online shopping
articles.author: Adrian Weckler
articles.summary: Google has launched an AI shopping agent that suggests, picks, and pays for items, utilizing a vast product listing database. Additionally, the company introduced a virtual "try on" feature for clothing, powered by a custom image generation model, and expanded its Gemini model offerings with new tiers and capabilities. The company also introduced a new top-tier AI subscription plan, Google Al Ultra, 'with the highest usage limits and access to our most capable models and premium features'.

articles.title: Project Astra comes to Google Search, Gemini, and developers
articles.author: Maxwell Zeff
articles.summary: Google announced that Project Astra, a low-latency, multimodal AI experience, will power new features in Google Search and the Gemini AI app. Project Astra's real-time video and screen-sharing capabilities are coming to all Gemini app users. Google is also building Project Astra-powered smart glasses with partners like Samsung and Warby Parker, and features for consumers and developers.

articles.title: Google introduces Shop with AI Mode with price tracking, agentic checkout, and virtual try-on
articles.author: Ivan Mehta
articles.summary: Google announced new AI-powered features for online shoppers, including a visual panel in Google Search's AI Mode and personalized price tracking. It is also introducing virtual try-ons, which allows users to upload photos to virtually try clothes, available in the U.S. under Google's Search Labs.

articles.title: Google is putting more AI in more places
articles.author: Ina Fried
articles.summary: Google announced Google AI Ultra, a $250-a-month subscription service, at the I/O developer conference. This new service aims to provide users with greater access to Google's AI models.

articles.title: Google's ‘universal AI assistant' prototype can now do stuff for you — and you don't even have to ask
articles.author: David Pierce
articles.summary: Google is developing new features for Project Astra, its AI assistant, including proactive assistance and the ability to access information from other Google products. Astra is also learning how to use Android phones, aiming to automate tasks and remove the need for user prompting. While still in development, these advancements signal Google's ambition to create a more universal and helpful AI assistant.

articles.title: Google will let you ‘try on' clothes with AI
articles.author: Emma Roth
articles.summary: Google is launching a new virtual try-on feature in Search Labs, allowing users to upload photos of themselves to see how clothing might look on them. The company is also rolling out an AI Mode for personalized product searches and an 'agentic' checkout feature using Google Pay to automate purchases.

articles.title: Google's universal AI assistant prototype just got a wild new feature
articles.author: David Pierce
articles.summary: Google DeepMind's Project Astra, an AI assistant, is getting new features like proactivity, access to web information, and the ability to use an Android phone. Astra can now accomplish tasks proactively without user prompting, access information from Google products and the web to assist users, and interact with an Android phone to perform actions like pairing headphones.

articles.title: Google's AI Mode goes prime time, a direct answer to ChatGPT Search
articles.author: Mark Sullivan
articles.summary: Google has launched AI Mode, its chatbot-style search interface powered by Gemini 2.5, which offers conversational AI answers and new shopping features like virtual clothing try-on. Additionally, Google plans to integrate Project Mariner for browser control and introduce enhanced personalization features to AI search this summer, indicating significant updates and new functionalities within Google's search services.

articles.title: How To Create Professional Videos For Your Startup With CapCut
articles.author: Sponsored
articles.summary: CapCut introduces its desktop video editor and AI video generator as free and powerful tools for startups to create professional videos. Features like text-to-speech, AI video generator, and voice changer enable startups to produce high-quality videos for marketing, pitching, and branding purposes, saving both time and money.

articles.title: Goodsleep Revolutionizing Sleep Comfort in Singapore  May. 20, 2025 17:10
articles.summary: Goodsleep Singapore has launched its Signature Mattress, featuring enhanced zonal support, GlacierCool fabric, and individual pocket springs, offered at wallet-friendly prices. They also offer Ergonomic Cloud Memory Foam Pillows and the Forest 2-in-1 Dehumidifier and Air Purifier. The Signature Mattress is fully customisable with three firmness level inserts: Soft, Medium, and Firm, allowing consumers to tailor their mattress to their exact preference.

articles.title: Nintendo Switch 2 OLED refresh might already be in the works
articles.author: BGR
articles.summary: Nintendo will debut its long-anticipated Switch 2 console in a few weeks. This release comes seven years after the original Nintendo Switch launch. Nintendo is expecting another major cycle with the upcoming release.

articles.title: Microsoft to host Grok on its cloud
articles.author: Nileena Sunil
articles.summary: Microsoft is adding xAI's Grok AI model to its Azure cloud service, allowing customers and its own product team to utilize it through Azure AI Foundry. Additionally, Microsoft has announced NLWeb, an open project for creating AI-powered websites with conversational interfaces, enabling the use of chosen models and data.

articles.title: Stanley limited-edition Next x Nature Canteen: Grab before it's too late
articles.author: Ashley Palya
articles.summary: Stanley has launched the Next x Nature Canteen, a limited-edition, 25-ounce stainless steel bottle priced at $45. The canteen features a tethered lid, wide opening, adjustable strap, and is available in Black Chroma and Ash colors, with the Rose Quartz option already sold out.

articles.title: Cireson Unveils Bold Rebrand, Merging Innovation and Simplicity for Microsoft-First IT Service Management
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Cireson launched a new brand identity, which includes unifying its Microsoft Service Manager Portal (SMP) solutions and its cloud-native Microsoft Teams-based product, Tikit, under one platform. The rebrand also introduces deeper integrations with Microsoft 365, smart automation, and a new API documentation hub.

articles.title: Netflix fans are hooked on hidden gem horror series 'that triggers paranoia and emotional disturbance'
articles.author: Michael Slavin
articles.summary: Netflix's series 'Brand New Cherry Flavor,' released in 2021, is gaining renewed attention due to a viral Reddit post. The horror series, starring Rose Salazar, is available to watch on Netflix and is described as an 'unsettling' watch with positive reviews.

articles.title: American Standard celebrates 150 years with innovative hygiene
articles.summary: American Standard introduced the DuoStix Hygiene Spray, a versatile tool for bathroom cleaning and personal cleansing, in the Asia-Pacific region. Additionally, American Standard fittings are now available in various colors, allowing consumers to personalize their bathrooms.

articles.title: Finally, Dyson Made a Floor Cleaner That's Better Than a Mop
articles.author: Jordan McMahon
articles.summary: Dyson introduced the WashG1, a cordless upright wet cleaner designed for hard floors. The WashG1 features a dual-brush system, clean and dirty water tanks, and a debris tray to pick up missed particles. Dyson claims it is effective at cleaning and simplifies the cleaning process for users.

articles.title: Yellow sun cream stains are banished thanks to just one 'amazing' item
articles.author: Ariane Sohrabi-Shiraz
articles.summary: Ace introduces Ace Ultra for Whites, a product designed to remove tough stains, restore whites, and protect fibres, specifically targeting sun cream stains on white clothing. The product is available on the Ace website, in local supermarkets, and on Amazon and involves using the product with regular detergent in the washing machine.

articles.title: Yellow sun cream stains are banished thanks to 'amazing' item
articles.author: Ariane Sohrabi-Shiraz
articles.summary: Ace introduces Ace Ultra for Whites, available for £3 on the Ace website and at supermarkets or Amazon, and Ace Ultra for Colors. Ace Ultra for Whites claims to remove tough stains and restore clothes back to brilliant white while protecting fibers. Users are advised to add it to their washing machine's CL symbol drawer or softener compartment.

articles.title: Father's Day gift guide 2025: we tried and tested 18 items
articles.author: Reviews Manager
articles.summary: The article features a range of Father's Day gift ideas including product launches and updates. Granado launched the 'Citrus Brasilis' fragrance, and Our Place introduced the 'Titanium Always Pan Pro' with a coating-free nonstick technology and lifetime guarantee.

articles.title: Innovation Minds and Amazon Business Collaborate to Enhance Employee Rewards and Recognition
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Innovation Minds has integrated Amazon Business into its platform, enabling employees to redeem points for rewards from Amazon Business's product catalog. This collaboration introduces a reimagined rewards experience with a familiar Amazon Business shopping interface directly from the Innovation Minds platform. Companies can now customize rewards programs within specified budgets and monitor usage trends.

articles.title: Starbucks drops new summer line up of vibrant-colored drinkware
articles.author: app
articles.summary: Starbucks released its new summer drinkware line, featuring new cold cups, new tumblers and a water bottle, at participating brick and mortar stores.

articles.title: There's one key way this cheap Oppo phone beats its rivals
articles.author: Connor Jewiss
articles.summary: Oppo launched the A5 Pro 5G, a budget phone available now in the UK for £229. The phone features a 5800mAh battery, IP69 water resistance, a 50MP camera, and a MediaTek Dimensity 6300 chip. It is available in Black Brown or Olive Green directly from Oppo or from carriers.

articles.title: Google I/O 2025: How to Watch Google's Biggest Event (and What to Expect)
articles.author: Andrew Lanxon
articles.summary: Google is expected to announce updates to its AI platform Gemini, including the 2.5 Pro update. The company may also talk about updates to its other products including GMail, Chrome and the Play Store, and Android 16. The I/O event will also highlight Android XR and Project Astra.

articles.title: 28 Of The Best Luxury Gifts For Her On Our Editors' Wishlists
articles.author: Kim Peiffer
articles.summary: Dyson is launching Airwrap. La Mer is launching Genaissance de la Mer collection. Therabody is launching TheraFace Mask.

articles.title: Google Outlines AI Advances at I/O Event, Including Shopping and Search Updates
articles.author: Andrew Hutchinson
articles.summary: Google has announced several new products and services, including an AI-powered shopping experience, virtual try-on features for clothing, advanced speech translation within Google Meet, and Google Beam, an AI-powered video communication platform. Google is also introducing 'Project Mariner' and 'AI Mode' to Google Search, along with updates to AI generation models, a new tool called 'Flow' for AI-generated films, AI avatars, and is collaborating with Gentle Monster and Warby Parker on AR glasses.

articles.title: Wayfair has this GE Nugget Ice Maker for $170 off — and you'll get free ...
articles.author: Lehigh Valley
articles.summary: Wayfair is offering GE nugget ice makers for under $400.

articles.title: Customer-Led Design: Kyle Reid Reveals the Secret Weapon SaaS Companies Overlook
articles.author: Created by
articles.summary: StoryBrand launched its AI marketing tool 'StoryBrand.ai' and subsequently introduced a new feature allowing users to generate assets from saved business profiles based on customer feedback.  This update, implemented rapidly, improved conversion rates from free trials to paid users by addressing customer requests for easier asset generation.

articles.title: LambdaTest Enhances Cross-Browser Testing with ChromeOS Support
articles.author: Globe Newswire
articles.summary: LambdaTest, a unified agentic AI and cloud engineering platform, launched comprehensive ChromeOS testing support. This new feature enables developers and QA teams to test web and Android apps in real-time on ChromeOS, ensuring compatibility and performance on Chromebooks.

articles.title: 'No smear' gadget that 'saves money on a window cleaner' is almost half price on Amazon
articles.author: Emily Sleight
articles.summary: Amazon is offering the Kärcher Window Vac at a reduced price of £45.99, a gadget designed for streak-free window cleaning by sucking up water and condensation. The product includes two suction nozzles and a cleaning cloth and has garnered positive customer reviews for its ease of use and effectiveness. Dunelm offers TOWER Cordless Window Vacuum for £30 and Argos sells Kleeneze 2 in 1 Telescopic Window Cleaning Set for £15.

articles.title: The OnePlus Pad 3 is coming June 5, and it might be the fastest Android tablet yet
articles.author: Craig Donaldson
articles.summary: OnePlus is launching the OnePlus Pad 3 on June 5, 2025, in the US and Canada. The tablet features Qualcomm's Snapdragon 8 Elite mobile platform and will be available in storm blue. Early purchasers will have the option to choose two free accessories such as the Smart Keyboard, Stylo 2, or Folio case.

articles.title: Starbucks drops new summer line up of vibrant-colored drinkware
articles.author: Tamara Walker
articles.summary: Starbucks launched its new summer drinkware collection, featuring cold cups, tumblers, and a water bottle in vibrant summer colors, available at participating stores starting May 20. The collection includes items like the ocean-inspired ombré blue-green cold cup ($32.95), a 'hands-free' cold cup with a matching carry case ($34.95), and a color-changing cold cup ($24.95), among other options.

articles.title: Temenos launches Gen AI Copilot for banks to deliver better products faster  May. 20, 2025 14:30
articles.summary: Temenos launched Temenos Product Manager Copilot, an AI assistant integrated with Microsoft Azure OpenAI Service. This new product empowers banks to design, launch, test, and optimize financial products more rapidly. General Availability for Temenos Product Manager Copilot is scheduled for Q4 2025.

articles.title: Global Bakery Expo Spotlight: Angel Yeast Launches Feravor™ – A Revolutionary Natural Flavor Solution for Clean-Label Baking
articles.author: PRNEWSWIRE
org: Yeast and Strain Resource Technology Center
articles.summary: Angel Yeast launched its Feravor™ series, a new line of flavored yeasts, at Europe's IBA 2025 and Asia's China Bakery Exhibition. The Feravor™ series includes Floral-Fruity and Butter variants, designed to enhance flavor naturally. These yeasts use patented microbial strains to intensify aroma in baked goods without additives.

articles.title: European seafood giant plots US market expansion to capitalize on rising surimi demand
articles.author: Hanna Gezelius Digital Editor
articles.summary: Viciunai Group is introducing surimi products, smoked salmon, and breaded fish as its initial seafood product offerings. The company emphasizes collaboration with partners for market penetration and consumer accessibility.

articles.title: Next's £28 linen dress that 'looks designer' is 'so cool' and 'flattering'
articles.author: Andrew Nuttall
articles.summary: Next is offering a V-Neck Ruffle Sleeve Mini Dress, a linen dress priced from £28, available in various colors, patterns and sizes ranging from 6 to 26, with regular and petite sizing options. The dress features ruffled sleeves and a mini-length design.

articles.title: Global Bakery Expo Spotlight: Angel Yeast Launches Feravor™ – A Revolutionary Natural Flavor Solution for Clean-Label Baking
articles.author: 美通社
org: Yeast and Strain Resource Technology Center
articles.summary: Angel Yeast launched its Feravor series, a flavored yeast solution with Floral-Fruity and Butter variants, at Europe's IBA 2025 and Asia's China Bakery Exhibition. This technology elevates flavor complexity and extends product freshness through microbial fermentation, enabling bakers to develop differentiated, clean-label offerings.

articles.title: Global Bakery Expo Spotlight: Angel Yeast Launches Feravor™ - A Revolutionary Natural Flavor Solution for Clean-Label Baking
articles.author: PR Newswire
org: Yeast and Strain Resource Technology Center
articles.summary: Angel Yeast launched its Feravor™ series, a groundbreaking flavored yeast solution designed to enhance natural flavors in baked goods. The Feravor™ series includes variants like Feravor™-Rose and Feravor™-Buttery, which impart natural aromas such as rose, fruit, brandy, and butter notes, respectively. This product line aims to meet the increasing demand for clean-label products in the baking industry by providing natural flavor-enhancing alternatives to artificial additives.

articles.title: The Future Of AI-Powered Test Automation With Gen AI
articles.author: Sponsored
articles.summary: ACCELQ is adopting Generative AI to revolutionize test automation, offering a smarter and more efficient testing approach. ACCELQ's intelligent AI platform dynamically generates automated test cases from functional flows, minimizing test design time, and ACCELQ Autopilot detects application changes and automatically updates test scripts, reducing human effort.

articles.title: Amazon rebrands GenZ fashion platform as ‘Serve'
articles.author: ETtech
articles.summary: Amazon has rebranded its Gen Z fashion platform, formerly Next Gen Store, to 'Serve' to target younger customers in tier-II and tier-III cities. The platform features products from over 350 domestic and global brands, monthly trend updates, lookbooks, and style edits curated by creators.

articles.title: Review: The Ninja blender – Ninja Detect TB403 identifies ingredients on its own
articles.author: ZEEV YANAI
articles.summary: Ninja Shark has launched the Ninja Detect TB403, a new food processor and blender featuring BlendSense technology for automatic ingredient detection and program adjustment. The device offers precise texture control with various settings and attachments for smoothies, spreads, doughs, and more. Adapted for the Israeli market, it includes a 1,200-watt motor, multiple containers, and blades.

articles.title: New Look shoppers love 'comfy' £27 spring trousers that 'wash well'
articles.author: Nadia Breen
articles.summary: New Look has launched light trousers priced at £26.99 made from 'soft denim', ideal for warmer weather. The relaxed-fit trousers come in a trendy wide leg style in light blue and darker blue shades, feature a mid-rise waist, slide slit pockets, and an elasticated drawstring waist.

articles.title: OnePlus Pad 3 set to launch on June 5, will come with multi-tasking tweaks in software
articles.summary: OnePlus is set to globally launch the OnePlus Pad 3 on June 5, featuring Qualcomm's Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset and iOS syncing support. The tablet will include an updated multitasking interface called Open Canvas and may be a rebranded version of the Pad 2 Pro, featuring a 13.2-inch LCD screen and up to 16GB RAM and 512GB storage.

articles.title: 'Powerful and lightweight' Dyson V6 vacuum cleaner on sale for less than half the price at £125
articles.author: Joshua Boyles
articles.summary: The Dyson V6 cordless vacuum cleaner, initially launched in 2014, is currently available at a discounted price, including refurbished models. It features a HEPA filter, multiple tools, and powerful suction. Alternative cordless vacuum cleaners are also available from SMOTURE and Shark.

articles.title: 36 Helpful Products That Simplify Tasks
articles.author: Mallory Mower
articles.summary: Bruvi is introducing a new coffee maker and starter set that prepares iced coffee, americano, tea, or latte. KitchenAid launches a shaved ice attachment for making snow cones at home. Anova releases a Bluetooth sous vide which attaches to any pot and cooks food to perfection using the built-in controls in the app.

articles.title: Wayfair is selling a ‘convenient' $700 nugget ice dispenser for $300, and shoppers say they love it
articles.author: Josie Howell
articles.summary: Wayfair is offering the Antarctic Star Nugget Ice Dispenser at a discounted price of $359 as part of its Memorial Day Sale. The ice maker features a display for ice cube count, water alerts, and status updates, along with free shipping and returns.

articles.title: Calling All Tender Lovers: Jollibee's NEW Chicken Tenders and Sauce Are Here!
articles.author: Jollibee
articles.summary: Jollibee has introduced new Chicken Tenders and Signature Tender Sauce at all of its Canada locations. The Chicken Tenders are made from 100% all-white meat chicken tenderloins. The Signature Tender Sauce is a velvety sauce that balances sweet and savory with a tangy touch.

articles.title: Digital PR firm celebrates eight years of Online News Platform
articles.author: Kasi Rye
articles.summary: Magic PR is celebrating the eighth anniversary of its News Front platform, a Google News-approved newsroom launched in 2018 that helps businesses boost their online visibility. The platform has expanded to feature over 43 industry categories and utilizes AI to transform press releases into podcasts and videos, distributed across various platforms.

articles.title: Win a hamper of Huggies® Dry Comfort® products
articles.author: Sarene Kloren
articles.summary: Huggies introduces the Dry Comfort Diaper, designed for maximum absorbency and dryness for up to 12 hours. It features fast-absorbing channels, a 3D topical surge liner, double leak guards, a back pocket for leakage protection, and an extra-wide flexible waistband to ensure a snug fit and prevent leaks.

articles.title: Balaji Barmavat: Enhancing AI Customer Experience And Support With Vision, Innovation, And Impact
articles.author: Manish Saini
articles.summary: Microsoft is launching technologies like Azure GPT-4 AI models, Azure AI Agents, and Azure AI Foundry and is using the Customer Experience Readiness Framework to improve customer experience and product launches. Microsoft also introduced the Development Copilot system, an AI-powered solution for support case analysis, and AI-powered guided troubleshooters for the Azure Data Platform.

articles.title: Z Turf Equipment Launches New Signature Series Video Featuring Modern Lawn & Tree Care
articles.summary: Z Turf Equipment has launched a new episode of its Signature Stories video series. The video series features Modern Lawn & Tree Care and highlights how they use Z Turf Equipment lawn care machines and Exmark mowers to improve their business. Exmark is promoting the video series on its Backyard Life website.

articles.title: A new book examines how Unilever used single-use plastic sachets to boost sales
articles.author: Saabira Chaudhuri
articles.summary: Hindustan Lever, a Unilever subsidiary, introduced shampoo sachets in India during the late 1980s, packaging Sunsilk and Clinic brands in single-use portions. This innovation made shampoo affordable and accessible to a larger segment of the population, especially those on daily wages, opening up a new multi-billion-dollar market.

articles.title: NovaCHARGE Introduces Flexx Mobile DC Fast Chargers for EV Hurricane Preparedness and Emergency Response
articles.author: info@kalkinemedia.com
articles.summary: NovaCHARGE debuted Flexx mobile EV chargers. Flexx chargers aim to aid municipalities with fast, rugged charging during hurricane emergencies.

articles.title: Deluxe Launches Generative AI Enterprise Platform
articles.author: Joplin Globe
articles.summary: Deluxe introduced DAX, an AI-powered assistant, to help partners make faster decisions and achieve better outcomes. DAX is now live within the Deluxe Merchant Services Daily Dashboard and is built on the Deluxe.ai enterprise platform.

articles.title: New Look shoppers snap up £34 dress in 5 colours that 'attracts many compliments'
articles.author: Catherine Addison-Swan
articles.summary: New Look is promoting its Drawstring Waist Textured Midi Dress, priced at £33.99 and available in five colors. They also introduced the Cotton Button Up Twill Shacket for £29.99, offering it in five colors and sizes six to 22.

articles.title: Top White Label SEO Services in the USA – Partner with Innovate Marketers
articles.summary: Innovate Marketers offers white label SEO services, enabling agencies to deliver SEO results under their own brand. Their services include national campaigns and local SEO in Kansas, with a focus on quality, transparency, and results for digital marketers and agencies.

articles.title: 5 Amazing Uses For The Viral The Pink Stuff Paste
articles.author: Dengarden
articles.summary: The Pink Stuff Paste, a multipurpose cleaning product from The Pink Stuff, can remove limescale, restore stained pans, erase wall marks, refresh white sneakers, and deep clean grout. These creative uses were recently shared by TikToker @cleaningwithnida.

articles.title: This gadget saved me hours on ironing and it's now £19.99 in Home Bargains
articles.author: Ray Bonsall
articles.summary: Home Bargains is selling the Swan handheld garment steamer for £19.99. The steamer quickly removes creases from clothes, curtains, and furniture fabric, especially on thinner materials, and is small enough for travel. However, it is not suitable for shaping clothes or ironing crisp collars.

articles.title: Next's £28 'simple yet flattering' dress shoppers want every colour
articles.author: Andrew Nuttall
articles.summary: Next has launched the V-Neck Ruffle Sleeve Mini Dress, starting from £28, available in sizes six to 26 and in regular or petite fits. Debenhams, UNIQLO, New Look and River Island also offers similar linen dresses.

articles.title: This $20 ‘Phone' Helps You Scroll Without The Internet
articles.author: Buzz Staff
articles.summary: Methaphone, a startup, has launched 'methaphone,' a $20 device resembling a smartphone but without digital content, designed to combat phone addiction by providing a tactile sensation similar to scrolling. The device aims to reduce anxiety and promote mindfulness by substituting digital interactions with a physical, screen-free experience.

articles.title: Swiggy introduces ‘Drops' for food lovers to order limited-edition dishes on first-come, first-serve basis
articles.author: The Hindu Bureau
articles.summary: Swiggy launched 'Drops', a new program offering limited-edition, chef-curated dishes exclusively on its platform. These 'Drops' are available for limited time intervals on a first-come, first-serve basis. Participating businesses include Le15 Patisserie, Smash Guys, and Louis Burger.

articles.title: Samsung launches Bespoke AI top load washing machines with AI wash in India, price starts at Rs 24,490
articles.author: TOI Tech Desk
articles.summary: Samsung has launched its new Bespoke AI top loading washing machine range, available in multiple capacities and colors. The washing machines feature AI Wash, Eco bubble, Hygiene Steam, Super Speed, and SmartThings integration, with prices starting at Rs 24,490.

articles.title: Amazon rebrands GenZ fashion platform as ‘Serve'
articles.author: ETtech
articles.summary: Amazon has rebranded its Gen Z fashion platform from Next Gen Store to Serve to target young customers in tier-II and tier-III cities. The platform features products from over 350 brands, monthly trend updates, lookbooks, and curated style edits.

articles.title: Gen Z Totally Missed Out On This Now-Discontinued Popsicle
articles.author: Joe Hoeffner
articles.summary: Nestlé previously sold Itzakadoozies popsicles. In 2013, a different, less exciting version of Itzakadoozies was sold at Disney World. Almost 10 years later, the classic spiral-shaped Itzakadoozies are available again at Walt Disney World.

articles.title: Amazon shoppers rush to buy £27 weed burner being hailed as 'absolutely brilliant'
articles.author: Christopher Harper
articles.summary: Amazon is offering the Draper Weed Burner for £26.99, reduced from £34.95. The burner features a 2000W element, two heat settings, and an interchangeable nozzle and B&Q and Hozelock are selling alternative products. Customers have praised the Draper Weed Burner for effective weed removal, while some have raised concerns about the cord length.

articles.title: Paradigm-backed AI startup Succinct launches token to transform contract analysis
articles.author: BTC Manager
articles.summary: AI startup Succinct launched its PROVE token. The token is part of a new protocol designed by Succinct.

articles.title: Kia Seltos ADAS features India
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Kia is testing the next-generation Kia Seltos on Indian roads. This signals a potential upcoming launch or update to the Seltos model.

articles.title: upcoming compact SUVs in India 2025
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Kia is testing its next-generation Seltos on Indian roads. This suggests an imminent introduction or launch of an updated model.

articles.title: First Direct offering new customers £175 in May
articles.author: Katie Elliott
articles.summary: First Direct is offering new customers £175 and access to a 7% interest savings account for switching current accounts. TSB launched a new deal offering up to £310 in cash and rewards for customers switching to their Spend and Save or Spend and Save Plus accounts, including cashback and a choice of rewards like a hotel voucher or activity tickets.

articles.title: SD Memory Cards Celebrates 25 Years as the World's Favorite Memory Card
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: SD Association celebrates the 25th anniversary of SD memory cards and the 20th anniversary of microSD, which have evolved to offer massive storage and fast speeds. The organization continues to innovate with SD Express memory cards which have SSD-level performance and features for demanding applications such as VR/AR, gaming and AI. SD cards remain crucial for storage across applications and devices.

articles.title: Meizu Deepens Its Globalization by Launching Cutting-Edge Smartphones and Wearables
articles.author: Pr Newswire
articles.summary: Meizu launched five new smartphones: MEIZU Mblu 22, MEIZU Mblu 22 Pro, MEIZU Note 22, MEIZU Note 22 5G, and MEIZU Note 22 Pro 5G. Additionally, Meizu launched the AR smart glasses StarV View and the health-centric StarV Ring2. These products will initially be available in Russia, Spain, Malaysia, and Vietnam.

articles.title: Goodsleep Revolutionizing Sleep Comfort in Singapore
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Goodsleep Singapore has launched the Signature Mattress, featuring customizable firmness, GlacierCool fabric, and individual pocket springs. The company also introduced sleep-enhancing accessories, including Ergonomic Cloud Memory Foam Pillows and the Forest 2-in-1 Dehumidifier and Air Purifier. These products are designed to offer premium sleep solutions at affordable prices for the Singaporean market.

articles.title: Uniqlo's 'light and flowy' £24.90 dress shoppers say is a 'summer staple'
articles.author: Elle May Rice
articles.summary: Uniqlo has launched the AIRism Cotton T-shirt Dress, priced at £24.90, which features AIRism technology and is available in multiple colors and sizes. Customer reviews highlight the dress's comfort and versatility, although some mention color and sizing discrepancies.

articles.title: 34 Things Reviewers Say Are Just As Good As The More Expensive Version
articles.author: Jordan Grigsby
articles.summary: The article features a range of products, including Essence Lash Princess Mascara, Cosrx snail mucin serum, Elizavecca hair treatment, Simple Modern tumbler, L'Oreal repairing hair treatment, Maybelline's Cheek Heat gel-cream blush, and Maybelline's Total Temptation Eyebrow Definer Pencil. It also includes E.l.f. Poreless Putty Primer, Fanola purple shampoo, First Aid Beauty's KP Bump Eraser Body Scrub Exfoliant, and Renpho percussion massager. These products are presented as solutions for various beauty and wellness needs, with comparisons to established brands and emphasis on affordability.

articles.title: Johnny's Chop Shop Unveils Volume & Texture Powder - The Ultimate Styling Hack for the UK's Most Wanted Haircut
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Johnny's Chop Shop is launching its new Volume & Texture Powder, designed to add instant lift and texture for men with straight or wavy hair. The product will be available exclusively in Boots & Sainsbury's for £7.95. The company created this product after data revealed the trending hairstyle known as the Textured Crop aka 'TikTok Hair'.

articles.title: Next launch new multipack of dresses which are 'casual' and 'comfortable' at £17 per dress
articles.author: Megan Archer-Fox
articles.summary: Next has launched a new two-pack of Jersey midi dresses, priced at £35 (£17.50 per dress). The pack includes a black vest dress and a taupe-colored dress, available in sizes from x-small to x-large. These dresses are designed for casual summer wear and are made from 95% cotton.

articles.title: Gen Z's new side hustle: selling data
articles.author: Erica Pandey
articles.summary: Generation Lab is launching VERB.AI, a new product that provides data insights by tracking young people's behavior. This product allows companies, nonprofits, and news organizations to query data about young people's behavior, offering more accurate information than traditional polling methods.

articles.title: Microsoft to offer Elon Musk's xAI models to cloud customers 微软向云客户提供马斯克旗下xAI模型
org: 微软正在向其云计算客户提供埃隆•马斯克(
articles.summary: Microsoft is offering xAI's Grok AI models to its cloud computing customers via the Azure AI Foundry platform. These models are available under licensing terms similar to those of OpenAI products. This move signals a change in Microsoft's relationship with OpenAI.

articles.title: Microsoft to offer Elon Musk's xAI models to cloud customers
articles.author: Cristina Criddle
articles.summary: Microsoft is making xAI's Grok models available to its Azure AI Foundry platform customers. Developers using Azure AI Foundry can purchase xAI's Grok models under the same terms as OpenAI's products.

articles.title: Production, Creative Partnerships Come To Hybrid Radio Ad Service
articles.author: Adam Jacobson
articles.summary: Yaman.ai, a new hybrid commercial creative service for radio, has partnered with Oink Ink Radio and Wondercraft. This collaboration introduces AI-powered services from Wondercraft and human creative services from Oink Ink Radio, creating a new offering for radio sellers and advertisers. Yaman.ai aims to use this hybrid model to enhance local direct revenue for radio stations.

articles.title: Lidl is selling a £2.99 product beauty fans are racing to nab – you don't have to wear foundation AND it contains SPF50
articles.author: Sarah Bull
articles.summary: Lidl has introduced a new tinted facial fluid with SPF 50, priced at £2.99. The product is receiving positive reviews for its color and coverage, with customers noting its suitability for daily use and holidays. It is considered a budget-friendly alternative to foundation.

articles.title: Beloved former flower shop in Newport to become home to all things vintage
articles.author: Geha Pandey
articles.summary: "Junk & Disorderly" is launching a new business in Newport, offering 'timeless treasures' from garden features to gifts. Additionally, Newport recently welcomed "Bronze Tanning Studio".

articles.title: Ace 5 Ultra colours and variants
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: OnePlus is preparing to launch its Ace 5 series with a dual-smartphone unveiling. The new series expands OnePlus' smartphone offerings.

articles.title: Extreme Networks Leads Industry with First All-in-One Networking Platform Powered by Conversational, Multimodal, and Agentic AI
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Extreme Networks launched Extreme Platform ONE, a new enterprise networking platform that integrates AI to automate tasks, enhance network visibility, and improve security. This platform aims to reduce manual tasks significantly and offers simplified licensing, addressing challenges and enabling connections for businesses.

articles.title: The business visionaries of 2025: Leaders who are shaping the future of global industries
articles.author: Indiatimes Online
org: Vijayan Trishul Defence Solutions Pvt. Ltd
articles.summary: Adil Qadri Fragrances launched its brand in 2019 and recently secured funding to accelerate vision. In 2024, Adil Qadri secured Rs 1 crore deal accelerating his vision,  Adil Qadri launched summer fragrance, AQ365. The company now has 15 stores across India and Dubai.

articles.title: Samsung Unveils Vision AI for Neo QLED, OLED, QLED and The Frame TVs, Bringing Intelligent, Immersive & Adaptive Screens to Consumers
articles.summary: Samsung Sri Lanka launched its 2025 Neo QLED 8K, OLED, QLED TVs, and The Frame lineup, featuring the new Samsung Vision AI technology. The new models are powered by advanced AI processors and offer enhanced picture and sound quality, personalized content discovery, and seamless multi-device connectivity. The flagship Neo QLED 8K is equipped with the NQ8 AI Gen3 Processor and boasts features such as 8K AI Upscaling Pro and Glare-Free technology.

articles.title: Ogilvy unifies social media offering in 16 APAC markets
articles.summary: Several brands, including Spinny, Lay's, Battlegrounds Mobile India (BGMI), Sting Energy, Vi, Fenesta, Lloyd, and Harpic, have launched new ad films and campaigns. These campaigns likely aim to promote or introduce new products and services from each respective company.

articles.title: அக்சஸ் 125 ஸ்கூட்டருக்கு சிறப்பு சலுகை வழங்கியிருக்கும் சுஸூகி.. என்னென்ன சலுகைகள் தெரியுமா?
articles.summary: Suzuki is offering a new variant of its Access 125 scooter. The new variant comes with special offers.

articles.title: If You Have A Busy Social Schedule Coming Up, These 25 Walmart Dresses Will Have Your Back
articles.author: Emma Kershaw
articles.summary: Walmart introduced a variety of new dresses, including flutter sleeve midi dresses, floral dresses, and maxi dresses, with prices ranging from $7.42 to $68.10. Sofia Vergara also launched a new red dress available at Walmart for $16.80, offering customers diverse styles and sizes for various occasions.

articles.title: Western Appliances turns 60: A legacy built on family moments
articles.summary: Western Appliances is celebrating its 60th anniversary with promotions throughout May 2025, including up to 60% off on appliances, instant discounts on select models, and bonus items for purchases of participating appliances from brands like Devant, Panasonic, and Samsung. Additionally, customers have a chance to win a trip to Hong Kong and can receive free desk or stand fans with the purchase of select air conditioners.

articles.title: Sundar Pichai's Google's new update to challenge Apple, Samsung, Motorola, no need to carry laptop, new feature will turn smartphones in…
articles.summary: Google is preparing to launch 'Desktop Mode,' a new feature that will enable smartphones to function as computers when connected to larger displays. This feature, anticipated with Android 17, offers a PC-like interface with multitasking capabilities similar to Chrome OS and may be unveiled alongside the new Pixel lineup.

articles.title: Karcher WV 6 Plus window vac now £68.99 in Amazon deal – save 37%
articles.author: Gareth Butterfield
articles.summary: Karcher's WV 6 Plus window vac, priced at £68.99 on Amazon, features a 100-minute battery, large waste tank, and a battery indicator. The WV 2 Plus N is available for £45.99 on Amazon and provides similar functionality with a smaller tank and battery.

articles.title: Temenos launches Gen AI Copilot for banks to deliver better products faster
articles.author: Temenos
articles.summary: Temenos has launched Temenos Product Manager Copilot, a Gen AI assistant that integrates with Microsoft Azure OpenAI Service and Temenos Retail core banking solution, empowering banks to design, launch, test, and optimize financial products faster.  The product offers a conversational way for product, IT, and customer service managers to explore Temenos' core banking functionality and data insights, helping banks to design and launch products faster and make them more relevant to customers. General Availability for Temenos Product Manager Copilot is scheduled for Q4 2025.

articles.title: 27 Splurge-Worthy Father's Day Gifts From Nordstrom
articles.author: Jonathan Mazzei
articles.summary: The article introduces a variety of new products targeting fathers as potential Father's Day gifts. These products range from tech gadgets like Marshall speakers and charging desk lamps to home goods such as Le Creuset bread ovens and Brightland olive oil. Each product is presented with its unique features and price, suggesting a targeted launch to appeal to diverse interests.

articles.title: Case study: How creatives are using AI to cut working time and improve results
articles.summary: Brands For Less launched a new product line utilizing AI-generated content, leading to reduced content production time and increased social engagement. Sephora launched an AI humanizer in 2024 to enhance customer interactions on social media, resulting in a 25% increase in sales. These implementations showcase AI's role in launching and improving products and services.

articles.title: Gwyneth Paltrow Has More to Say About 'Vagina' Candle
articles.author: Rob Quinn
articles.summary: Goop, Gwyneth Paltrow's lifestyle brand, launched the "This Smells Like My Vagina" candle five years ago. Paltrow states the product originated as a joke.

articles.title: YES SKINCARE LAUNCHES ITS E-COMMERCE PLATFORM WITH FIVE ESSENTIAL SKINCARE PRODUCTS - A BOLD STEP TOWARDS SIMPLIFIED, SCIENCE-BACKED SKIN WELLNESS
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: TLL Elements Pvt. Ltd, a subsidiary of Trident Lifeline Ltd., has launched YES SKINCARE, a direct-to-consumer skincare brand. The brand debuts with five essential skincare products: Face Cardio Cleanser, Daily Drenching Moisturizer, You Are B-Right Vitamin C Serum, Glow Bank All-in-One Serum, and In The Shade Sunscreen, all available on their e-commerce platform.

articles.title: Swan water unveils new package
articles.author: The Sun
articles.summary: Swan Natural Spring Water introduced refreshed packaging for its product. The new packaging carries the endorsement seal of the Nigerian Medical Association. The updated bottle design maintains the elegance Swan is known for.

articles.title: Gwyneth Paltrow Has More to Say About 'Vagina' Candle
articles.author: Rob Quinn
articles.summary: Goop initially launched "This Smells Like My Vagina" candle, which was later discontinued. The company then introduced follow-up products, including "This Smells Like My Orgasm," "This Smells Like My Prenup," and "Hands off My Vagina."

articles.title: Q1 2025 NIU Technologies Earnings Call
articles.author: Thomson Reuters Street Events
articles.summary: NIU Technologies launched new electric motorcycles, including the NX Pro, MX, ML, and FX series, and electric bicycles like the NXT, MT, and MMT in Q1 2025. The NX Pro motorcycle, priced at RMB 9,999, achieved 2000 preorders and set sales records on platforms like Douyin and JD.com. The NXT electric bicycle features dual-channel ABS and caters to consumers seeking high-end features.

articles.title: MetaOptics Launches Automatic Metalens Tester to Improve Mass Production Sorting Capabilities
articles.author: The Galveston Daily News
articles.summary: MetaOptics launched its new Automatic [product name missing but implied] on May 19, 2025, in Singapore.

articles.title: 44 Excellent Products With *Super* Affordable Price Tags
articles.author: Gabriela Manjarrez
articles.summary: Wet n Wild launched a long-lasting lipstick with aloe vera formulation. Gold Bond introduced firming neck and chest cream. Catrice released "Instant Awake" Under Eye Brightener infused with hyaluronic acid and shea butter. Bio-Collagen launched Real Deep sheet mask. E.l.f introduced Lash XTNDR Tubing Mascara. EOS launched Shea Butter Vanilla Cashmere body lotion.

articles.title: Microsoft's Plan To Fix the Web: Letting Every Website Run AI Search for Cheap
articles.summary: Microsoft announced NLWeb, an open protocol designed to democratize AI-powered search capabilities for websites and apps. This protocol allows site owners to implement ChatGPT-style natural language search with minimal code.

articles.title: Google Launches NotebookLM App For Android and iOS
articles.summary: Google launched the NotebookLM app for Android and iOS.

articles.title: Honda's redesigned Amaze compact sedan launching in South Africa this week
articles.author: Jason Woosey
articles.summary: Honda is launching the heavily updated Amaze compact sedan in South Africa this week, featuring a bolder look and smarter cabin for 2025. The new Amaze boasts a redesigned exterior with a honeycomb grille and horizontal taillamps, as well as an updated interior with an 8.0-inch infotainment screen and enhanced safety features. Pricing is expected to start below R300,000.

articles.title: Emergent: Agentic workspace for developers
articles.author: Mazi
articles.summary: Emergent is introduced as an all-in-one workspace for developers, offering features for planning, coding, testing, and deployment within a single tab. It also provides capabilities for code maintenance and refactoring, including automating library upgrades and simplifying migrations to streamline the development process and reduce manual errors.

articles.title: Top 6 AI-powered content creation tools for SMEs
articles.author: Yajush Gupta
articles.summary: Jasper helps SMEs write long-form content and ad copy, offering features like Boss Mode, tone control, and team collaboration. Copy.ai provides quick and effective copy for short-form content like product descriptions and headlines. These AI-powered platforms are designed to make content creation more efficient and affordable for small businesses.

articles.title: Geeklab: Comprehensive game marketing suite
articles.author: Mazi
articles.summary: Geeklab empowers game and app growth via comprehensive marketing strategies. Focusing on concept validation, app store optimization (ASO), and user acquisition (UA), Geeklab offers game developers the tools needed for success. The platform allows developers to validate game concepts by creating detailed look-alike pages for each variant, aiding in testing and assessing user engagement.

articles.title: Why has GroupM lost its way for so long? The buck stops with WPP
articles.summary: Spinny, Lay's, Battlegrounds Mobile India (BGMI), Sting Energy, Vi, Fenesta, Lloyd, and Harpic are releasing new ad films and campaigns. These brands are actively promoting their products or services through these advertisements.

articles.title: Louise McSharry: My four go-to SPFs when you're looking for more than just sun protection
articles.author: Louise McSharry
articles.summary: Several companies have launched new products. Hawaiian Tropic offers Hydrating Protection Sunscreen Lotion, while Nuxe presents Sun Oil Gold Shimmer High Protection. Kopari introduced Sunglaze Sheer Body Mist SPF30, and Bondi Sands offers Hydra UV Protect SPF 50+. Byoma features Smoothing Body Polish and Smoothing Body Serum, and Joonbyrd launched Kaleidoscope Body Serum. Each product caters to different skincare needs and preferences, promising sun protection, hydration, or exfoliation.

articles.title: MY LITTLE WARLORD and SHAZAM among new DC GO! webcomic title announcements
articles.author: The Beat
articles.summary: DC introduced six new original DC GO webcomics.

articles.title: How AI Is Changing Web Scraping: From Coding To Natural Language
articles.summary: AI-driven web scraping tools are transforming data extraction, offering capabilities like natural language commands and automated subpage navigation exemplified by solutions like Thunderbit. These tools simplify data gathering by enabling users to describe their needs in plain English and automatically adapt to website changes, facilitating faster, more accurate data extraction with reduced IT involvement, ultimately enabling businesses to enhance pricing strategies and decision-making.

articles.title: Myntra makes global foray, enters Singapore
articles.summary: Myntra has launched Myntra Global, a direct-to-consumer service, in Singapore, targeting the Indian diaspora. The company aims to understand consumer preferences and build brand traction before considering broader expansion. Myntra's CEO highlights their focus on learning and achieving product-market fit.

articles.title: Swiggy introduces ‘Drops' for food lovers to order limited-edition dishes on first-come, first-serve basis
articles.author: The Hindu
articles.summary: Swiggy launched its 'Drops' initiative. The initiative offers limited-edition dishes from popular food brands and chefs on a first-come, first-serve basis.

articles.title: OnePlus Pad 3 with Snapdragon 8 Elite SoC to launch on June 5: Here's what ...
articles.author: Hindustan Times
articles.summary: OnePlus will launch its new tablet, the OnePlus Pad 3, on June 5, 2025. The tablet will feature Qualcomm's Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset.

articles.title: Sainsbury's axes key feature in stores as shoppers say 'please put it back!'
articles.author: The Mirror
articles.summary: Sainsbury's is implementing a change to its TU clothing range. Shoppers are now required to try on items from the range at home. This change indicates a new service or approach related to clothing purchases.

articles.summary: Google Search is introducing new features, marking a significant change from its previous format.

articles.summary: Google's Gemini will power new shopping features that allow users to find specific items.

articles.author: The Verge
articles.summary: Google is launching Imagen 4, a new image generation model. The company claims it offers 'stunning quality' and 'superior typography'. Imagen 4 demonstrates remarkable clarity in fine details and excels in both photorealistic and abstract styles.

articles.title: Google's Veo 3 and Imagen 4 Generative AI Models Crank the Realism Dial to 11

articles.summary: Google announced a range of new software, technology, and features at Google I/O 2025.

articles.title: Nintendo Switch 2 Game Fully Funded on Kickstarter

articles.summary: Nintendo is preparing to launch the Nintendo Switch 2. The upcoming console will feature first-party IPs and third-party releases.

articles.author: The Sun
articles.summary: Google has introduced a new feature allowing users to virtually try on billions of garments online, aiming to solve the problem of ill-fitting clothes ordered online.

articles.title: This blush is an affordable alternative to Rare Beauty's £23 formula
articles.author: The Independent
articles.summary: No7 offers a blush product priced at £10 less than a comparable item, maintaining similar quality.

articles.title: I reviewed the Oukitel WP300 rugged phone and somehow packs in a earpiece, lamp, and ...
articles.author: Tech Radar
articles.summary: Oukitel is introducing a new modular phone. This phone has options for integrating a watch and a light as modules.

articles.title: Google's AI Mode Will Change Your Search Experience. Here's How
articles.author: CNET
articles.summary: Google is introducing "frontier capabilities" of generative AI to its search page. This update enhances the search service with advanced AI features.

articles.title: Destiny Rising's Closed Beta Date Info Coming, New Trailer Drops
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Destiny Rising, a Destiny mobile offering, has released a new trailer and information about its beta program. This signals the upcoming availability or introduction of the new mobile service.

articles.title: Google will let you ‘try on' clothes with AI
articles.author: The Verge
articles.summary: Google is launching an updated virtual try-on feature, accessible through Search Labs in the US, that enables users to upload their own photos to visualize how clothing would appear on them. This new feature uses AI to simulate how different materials fold, stretch, and drape on various body types.

articles.title: Expedera's Origin Evolution NPU IP Brings Generative AI to Edge Devices
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Expedera launched its Origin Evolution NPU IP, designed to accelerate Large Language Models (LLMs) on resource-constrained edge devices. This new hardware and software architecture offers ultra-efficient power, performance, and area (PPA) and is compatible with both LLMs and traditional neural networks. The Origin Evolution AI inference engine is suitable for applications in smartphones, automobiles, and data centers.

articles.title: Greggs customers annoyed over its new summer menu – with one big complaint
articles.author: Manchester Evening News
articles.summary: Greggs introduced new items to its summer menu. Customers on Instagram expressed their dissatisfaction with the available options.

articles.summary: Google is now offering one of its AI tools for free on mobile platforms.

articles.author: Indian Express
articles.summary: Google announces a host of new products.

articles.title: This is what you get from Google's VIP AI subscription service for $250 per month
articles.author: Shacknews
articles.summary: Google aims to be the first to offer a comprehensive, single-fee subscription for all AI needs. This represents Google's effort to introduce a novel AI subscription service to the market.
